div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 2062 Messina, 1895 (686) Burial: c. 493 B.C. (Evans) Contents: c. 186 AR. Found during road work Zancle: 156 dr. (6 rev. dolphin etc. incuse; 150 rev. shell in incuse square) Naxus: 30 dr. Disposition: London (NC 1900, pl. 1, 1); Jameson 638, 672; SNGLloyd 1073-4; Ward 221 â€ Evans, NG 1896, pp. 100-7, illus. Cahn, Naxos, p. 85
